name: WebServiceCallout

methods.name: invoke
methods.signature: public static void invoke(Object stub, Object request, Map<String,Object> response, List<String> infoArray)
methods.description: Invokes an external SOAP web service operation based on an Apex class that is auto-generated from a WSDL.
